header: South Africa crush England in World Cup final
body: South Africa dominate England in the Rugby World Cup in Japan to become champions for a third time.

header: German city declares a ‘Nazi emergency’
body: The politician behind the resolution says he wanted Dresden to take a stand against the far-right.

header: Deadly car bomb in Turkish-controlled border town
body: At least 13 people died in Syrian's Tal Abyad, recently taken by pro-Turkish forces, Turkey said.

header: Trump says Beto O'Rourke 'quit like a dog'
body: The US Democratic presidential hopeful, a fierce Trump critic, ended his campaign on Friday.

header: Video 59 secondsChile's 'women in black' demand justice
body: At least 20 people have died during the nationwide protests demanding economic and political change.

header: Quit 'coal addiction', UN boss warns Asia
body: António Guterres says Asian countries must use greener energy sources to tackle the climate crisis.

header: Vietnam condemns 'human trafficking'
body: The move comes after British police say 39 people found dead in a truck last week are believed to be Vietnamese.

header: Blast kills nine children as they walk to school
body: The Afghan children accidentally triggered a roadside bomb on their way to class, officials say.

header: Fracking halted after UK government pulls support
body: Drilling for shale gas will cease in England - but the government stops short of an outright ban.

header: US football coach banned for too big a victory
body: Plainedge High School's coach will be absent because his team won by 48 points last week.

header: Mali attack kills dozens of soldiers
body: The army calls the assault on a military post in the north-east a "terrorist attack".

header: Johnson urged to publish Russian interference report
body: Dominic Grieve says it's essential to publish the document ahead of the general election.

header: Gebrselassie blames Facebook for Ethiopia violence
body: The running legend says hate speech on the social network was behind the deaths of 78 people.
